title: Spectacle Director Showcase: Natasha Pincus
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion picture industry - Australia
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion picture producers and directors - Australia
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion pictures - Australia - History
abstract: Interview with music video director Natasha Pincus.
description: Natasha Pincus is a multi award winning Australian music video director and producer and has won the ARIA award for Best Music Video two years in a row.  Her stop motion animation video for Gotye's 'Somebody That I Used to Know' has had a staggering 420 million views. Natasha talks about getting her first big break making a music video for Paul Kelly.  Created as part of "Spectacle : The Music Video Exhibition" 26 September 2013 - 23 February 2014. ACMI Digital Programs worked with Exhibitions to interview five Australian directors featured in the exhibition about the art and techniques of music video production.
